mapper.select: select a.insidercardno vipNo, a.mobile mobile, a.insidername name, decode(a.sex, 1, 'male', 2, 'female', '') gender, a.idcard idCard from gpcs_insider a, gpcs_placepoint b where a.placepointid = b.placepointid and b.entryid = 2 and a.mobile = #{mobile}

select a.insidercardno vipNo, a.mobile mobile, a.insidername name, decode(a.sex, 1, 'male', 2, 'female', '') gender, a.idcard idCard from gpcs_insider a, gpcs_placepoint b where a.placepointid = b.placepointid and b.entryid = 2 and a.insidercardno = #{vipNo}

select a.rsaid orderId, b.oldrsaid sourceId, b.rsadtlid detailId, d.insidercardno vipNo, a.insiderid vipId, b.goodsid goodsId, e.goodsname goodsName, e.currencyname goodsName1, b.goodsqty goodsQty, b.realmoney money, e.goodstype goodsType, e.goodsunit goodsUnit, f.factoryname factoryName, to_char(a.credate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') orderTime, a.placepointid deptId, c.placepointname deptName, d.mobile mobile from gresa_sa_doc a, gresa_sa_dtl b, gpcs_placepoint c, gpcs_insider d, pub_goods e, pub_factory f where a.rsaid = b.rsaid and b.goodsid = 9931 and a.placepointid = c.placepointid and c.entryid = 2 and a.insiderid = d.insiderid(+) and b.goodsid = e.goodsid and e.factoryid = f.factoryid(+) and a.credate between to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

select c.insidercardno vipNo, a.couponnum couponNum, a.rsaid orderId, to_char(a.rsacredate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') useTime, '1' status from gresa_coupon_manager a, gresa_sa_doc b, gpcs_insider c where a.rsacredate between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and a.apprangeid in (5804,5805,5806,5807) and a.rsaid = b.rsaid and a.couponstatus = 3 and b.insiderid = c.insiderid
